thread.title: CarWale Registers 21.08 Million Group Visits in August 2015
thread.title_full: CarWale Registers 21.08 Million Group Visits in August 2015

title: CarWale Registers 21.08 Million Group Visits in August 2015
text:
Wednesday, September 2, 2015 11:18AM IST (5:48AM GMT) CarWale Registers 21.08 Million Group Visits in August 2015 Mumbai, Maharashtra, India 
India’s largest automotive portal, CarWale registered 21.08 million group visits in the month of August 2015, a 28.47% growth over last year. Of this, CarWale recorded 16.85 million visits while its two-wheeler counterpart BikeWale clocked 4.23 million visits. Despite the emergence of new players in the automotive space, CarWale recorded a 28.5% YoY growth to maintain its position as the market leader. BikeWale mirrored CarWale’s performance and recorded an almost identical 29% YoY increase, retaining its undisputed position as the No.1 two-wheeler portal in India. August 2015 also saw the launch of CarWale’s redesigned website. The new look takes a modern, minimal and clutter-free approach and has received a lot of positive feedback from the users. The company promises that the coming month has a lot of excitement in store as it celebrates its tenth anniversary with a big bang. About CarWale CarWale, India's largest automotive portal is owned by Automotive Exchange Private Limited and is a part of the Axel Springer group. CarWale has been recognised by IAMAI as the Best Auto Website in India, twice in a row (2011 and 2012), among several other awards from Red Herring, Business Week and PC World magazine for its contribution to the Indian automotive industry. For News Release background on CarWale click here Deesha Shetty, CarWale, +91 (22) 67398888, Deesha.shetty@carwale.com
